ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Good burst regen of HP and Mana
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Use for early pushing power, teamfights, and for hte stats.  Buy the buckler first.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Great on you; buy if nobody else has.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Take early to provide much-needed mana regen.  Use charges to sustain pushes or nuke down low HP enemy heroes
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: If the other team has a really gnarly carry, grab this instead.
ItemTooltips.heart: If you have a hard time staying alive
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Only if other team has a lot of disables and are unable to be effective in team fights.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Your #1 best luxury for survival and teamfight utility.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Take so that you can cast your spells continuously!  If your team has lot of Arcane boots take some treads
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: A good early item that will boost your utility and survival.  Use charges to chase, flee, and siege towers.

AbilityTooltips.elder_titan_echo_stomp: Does an AOE pseudo-stun after a 1.7 channel.  The damage stays same but duration rises.
AbilityTooltips.elder_titan_ancestral_spirit: Your best skill!  Use to harass enemies in lane and as proxy for using the echo stomp
AbilityTooltips.elder_titan_natural_order: Max early to push and win.
AbilityTooltips.elder_titan_earth_splitter: Does tremendous damage after a 3.14 second delay.  Try to set up with echo slam and then hit enemies duirng the stun.
